description: Orthologous groups from STRING v12.0 at the Eukaryota level, with gene trees from eggNOG v7
tree_method: eggNOG v7 phylogeny-based protein family trees (domain-centric workflow with ML inference)
citations: Szklarczyk, D., et al. (2023). The STRING database in 2023. Nucleic Acids Research, 51(D1), D483-D489.
Hernández-Plaza, A., et al. (2026). eggNOG v7. Nucleic Acids Research, 54(D1), D402.
